content.p: Welcome to the Focus on feature of our website where we showcase some of the most exciting research activity happening among the Pain Centre Versus Arthritis research community. Focus on will feature research by our University of Nottingham team of experts from across all research themes including the exciting work of our senior researchers, research fellows, and doctoral students. We will highlight the work of our collaborative partners from around the world and present our programme of public and patient engagement with our musculoskeletal patient advisory group. Finally, we will present outputs and discussion from our active meetings calendar encompassing the most novel and exciting arthritis and pain research from across the globe. Find our most recent focus on features. Clinical Sciences Building City Hospital Nottingham, NG5 1PB telephone: +44 (0) 115 823 1766 ext 31766 fax: +44 (0) 115 823 1757 email: paincentre@nottingham.ac.uk
